mapper.sql: id, m_id, c_id, power_id, isEmpty, p_lockï¼ŒupdateTime
mapper.select:
select m.id, m.m_id, m.c_id, m.power_id, m.isEmpty, m.p_lock, m.updateTime, p.power_id, p.is_enable, p.p_quantity, p.p_count, p.is_back, p.id, p.c_id
from m_power m, power p where m.m_id = #{m_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and m.power_id = p.power_id and m.power_id != "" and m.c_id = p.c_id
mapper.insert:
insert into m_power
id,
m_id,
c_id,
power_id,
isEmpty,
p_lock,
updateTime,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update m_power
m_id = #{mId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
power_id = #{powerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isEmpty = #{isempty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
p_lock = #{pLock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
